titleStmt.title: An act for the better propagation and preaching of the Gospel in Wales, and redress of some grievances. Die Veneris, 22⁰ Februarii, 1649. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
England and Wales. Parliament. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Edward Husband and John Field, printers to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: 6M⁴ 6N² . Also issued as part of a through-paged set with a table for the entire set added.
On 6M2: last word of first line of text: "England"; first word of line below initial: "Enacted"; last word of last full line: "John".
Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1758 as Wing (2nd ed.) E1098.
Ornament on t.p.; initial letter; some text in black letter.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts), and the Cambridge University Library (Early English books, 1641-1700).
